1.content:
Before we begin, we need a plot. So here's a list of story ideas to get started.

Story 1

At the Central Park Zoo, due to zoo staff taking care of her every need, Gloria begins to get lazy which soon leads to her gaining pounds

Story 2

On Madagascar, Gloria finds a new fruit on the island and becomes addicted to it, wanting more and more to eat as her already wide waistline grows wider

Story 3

Out in the wild with no zoo stuff to control her food intake, Gloria goes on a feeding frenzy that leads to her living life large


If you have any ideas for a storyline, feel free to add.
1.title: Choosing a storyline

11.content:
Gloria waskes up one day and finds herself at the zoo, her passion has always been gluttony; but this is no ordinary, "Zoo".

Gloria is alone in a rather large chamber, half of it was a fresh water swimming pool 700 gallons full, half dry ceramic tile floor, execpt some makshift bedding.

She now feels hungry, Little did she know of the feast ready for her to eat above the chamber, on the surface.

heading to the surface Gloria found the feast and begain to eat till she eats...
11.title: Santuary

112.content:
She ate 3/4ths of the huge meal, and her belly was showing it. She just couldn't eat anymore. All Gloria could do was lay on her back and wait for it to digest.

After a few minutes, a zoo keeper came. "Hey girl, how are you doing? He looked at her almost finished plate and smiled., "well it certainly looks like you're doing well. just stay right there and i'll sort the place up." with that, the zoo keeper begain to clean the pen and refilled Gloria's plate.

"there, now all that's left is for to clean you up."

At first, Gloria began to move, about to go to the water section of her place when the zoo keeper stopped her,

"Now, now" he said with a chuckle, just stay still and we'll be done in a bit." he that, he fetched a bucket of water and a sponge and began to wash Gloria

The weight goes to her stomach and she is too lazy to get to the food
The weight is evenly spread out and she goes back to eating
113.content: All the food trucks at the zoo had dumped the days leftovers over the embankment near Gloria's habitat. A veritable feast lay before Gloria. The female hippo immediately began to devour the mass of fried food that lay infront of her. 10 minutes and 250 deep fried corn dogs later Gloria waddeled back to her enclosure's bedding area to sleep off the 50 pounds of fried food.
113.title: a 1/4 of it

114.content:
After taking the final bite, Gloria surveys the damage. Her stomach bulges further than usual. She’s big.

She tries to roll onto her side, but the sheer weight of her body is too much. Her belly is too big for her legs and she resigns to staying put.

The zoo keeper comes in, “woaaah girl! You outdid yourself today!”

Then he...
The keeper pats Gloria’s belly which is around his height now. Gloria lets out a burp and a moan of satisfaction.

“You’d better swim this off girl, or we’ll be taking you for your checkups with an even bigger crane than last time!” he chuckled.

With a little help from the keeper, Gloria manages to heave her enormous belly off the ground and towards the entrance to her chamber. She dips her head and shoulders down inside then ‘thwwp’

Her bulging middle is stuck in the doorway.

“Oh we might have given you a little too much feed today girl!” Chuckles the keeper as he looks at the huge blob of grey mass in front of him.
114.title: All of the feast

choices: They headed home, Gloria taking some of the fruit  with her
12.content:
Gloria sat back and relaxed on her makeshift deck chair. It had been a few weeks since the Now York gang had arrived at Madagascar and made a comfy living for themselves.

“Hey Gloria, how’s it hanging?” Marty said as he and Melman walk up to her,

“Not much Marty, I’m just relaxing here soaking up the sun.” Gloria said “What are you two guys up to?”

“We’re on our way for a walk through the jungle and look for some fruit, want to join us?”

“Sure thing, stripes” Gloria said, getting up and joining the forage hunt.

After awhile on their walk, the three friends soon came across large field of bushes filled with a tropical looking fruit.

“Hey guys, what do you think of these?” Gloria said, picking one of the strange fruit,

“I don’t know, looks kinda funky” Marty said looking at the fruit

“I don’t think you should touch it Gloria, it might be poisonous”

Gloria disregarded her friends’ warnings and took a bite out of the fruit. As soon as the taste reached her taste buds, Gloria’s eyes widened in pleasant shock. The fruit was the juiciest, the sweetest, the tastiest thing she had ever eaten, she took another bite and another till the fruit was gone. Gloria looked at the fruit bush, she decided she had to have more
12.title: The Fruit

Gloria stopped eating the fruit and looked at the two then at the fruit

She goes to the edge and starts drinking as fast as she possibly can. But after about 2 hours, she had only grown 3 inches. But she was beginning to notice the effects. Her stomach now swayed slightly side to side every step she took. Her arms had thickened slightly, and her butt had grown more wide than it had large. She stopped and looked back up at the tree. 12112121212.content:
As the Gloria kept on banging against the tree, the shakes were so loud everyone could hear them.

It was morning and Alex, Marty, Melman, and everyone else was sleeping on the beaches until they heard shaking noises. Alex reacted, "Whoa, whoa. What's that noise? Do we have an earthquake or something," Alex asked and he wanted to know. Seconds later everyone else started waking up slowly.

Then Melman asked a totally different question, "Um, where's Gloria?"

"Last time I heard about her it was she was eating some kind of exotic fruit, then we brought her back here," Marty remembered and said. "Alex go find her and deal that noise. You are the stronger one and fix problems like these!" Marty had to yell the last line because the noises were louder than ever.

Alex sighed, "Ahh, okay,I'll deal with this problem. I'll be back to tell you what the problem was." Alex walked into the jungle and after a 10 minute walk tracking the sound he was really close to Gloria but didn't know. Alex hid behind a tree and peeked around the corner. For a second he saw Gloria banging against the tree. She huge and fat but this was worse. Over to his left he saw chewed up fruits and what was a big river now only a tiny stream. "This is bad," Alex said to himself, "What will I do?"

She looks at her big belly and smiles in admiration. Then, Moto Moto walks up with an arm-full of strange-looking fruit. He sets them down.

Moto Moto: Morning, beautiful.

Gloria: Morning. Those fruits look good. May I?

Moto Moto: By all means.

Gloria eats one of the fruits.

Gloria: Mmmm. That tasts so...

She is interupted by a strange feeling. Then she starts getting fatter. Her belly grows until it touches the ground, her butt swells with fat. Fat forms on her arms and legs. Her breasts become the size of basketballs and her face gets chubbier and forms a second chin.

Gloria: Whoa!

Moto Moto (Smiling): Oh my. Those fruits WERE super-fattening, you're even plumpier. Mmm. Girl, you so chunky, I think I love you even more.

Gloria...

As A Hippo Gloria always loved her fat frame, and she loves Moto Moto even more. Furthermore in Hippo Society Blubber is the standard of beauty, especially for the women.

Gloria felt even sexier than she ever had before, so it's comes as no surprise that she chose to embrace it.

"I feel more beautiful than ever sweetie." Gloria Winked.

"Glad you like it." Replied Moto Moto.

Gloria then wonders about the next response.

14112.content:
"For now?" Motto Motto looks a bit disappointed.

Gloria rubbing her belly eyes this and calms him down, "Oh don't worry handsome, I want you to make me even fatter. I just think we should do so in a more.." She emphasizes the surroundings, mostly grass but with several rocks and no trees for shade, "... Comfortable location."

Motto Motto notices the rocks and absence of shade. "Oh, ok. Where to go then?"

Gloria pats her belly and wiggles her rump, "Well wherever you choose save the super fattening fruit for when we get there, It'll take me a while to get there at this weight more will just take more time,"

"I understand" Motto Motto reluctantly agreed. Struggling to decide where to go, His mind narrowed to 2 choices,

There is a big watering hole not far from here where she would be able to rest in the water and grow, might anger some animals if they lose a place to drink but the hole he's thinking of using for Gloria is a spare one smaller than the main one so that should hopefully keep them quiet.

The other place is a Forested Valley with plenty of shade no rocks lots of comfy moss to rest upon but it's wide open for predators and would be more difficult to bring water for her there.
14112.title: This will be good. For now.

The Central park zoo had done a survey about what people thought about a new add on to the zoo, where kids could actually hug the animals, similar to a petting zoo. 152.content:
Alex was enjoying Madagascar with his friends, but there was something that he had to get off of his back. Ever sense he came to the Zoo in New York, he laid eyes on Gloria, he fell in love. It wasn't just cause she was sweet... it was because she was BIG! Day after Day he'd do his usual performance for the visitors but he'd find himself staring at Gloria, her round figure dancing in the water. This went on for a bit then he'd imagine her being even bigger than she was. This expanded to him feeding her and rubbing her soft belly, watching it grow with fat. This day dream would soon end and he'd go back to performing. He told himself one day he would make his dreams come true. Everyday for his birthday, he'd ask Gloria for a hug. Since they were friends, Gloria never gave it much thought, so she'd smile, say ok and give him a big hug. Alex loved the feeling, the warmth.

Today, Alex was now with Marty, Melvin, & Gloria. He didn't want anyone to know about his secret, but he knew that Gloria would find out... but what if he tried to lay low and try to fatten her up without her knowing? Then again... what if he was caught in the act, that could possibly ruin their friendship. He could also ask her on a date and show that he truly loved her, but what if she took it the wrong way? Marty & Melvin would find out too, which could lead to problems. His final option was to feed her then and there, just talk her into going into the forest with him and he would do the rest, the other 2 wouldn't find out and Gloria might actually look at it how he did! Then again... she may not want to be fatter, and that would be a poor way at trying to convince her fattening up would be great for her.

Alex finally decided to...

info.brief_description: Gloria from Madagascar gets bigger and better as she begins to pile on the pounds!
info.description:
That’s right! This interactive story is about Gloria, the big, fat hippo from DreamWorks Madagascar getting bigger and fatter as she stuffs her face and pile on the pounds.

Before we begin, here are some ground rules:

No killing or injuring characters
Only Gloria can gain
No slob stuff such as farting and belching
No vore
No gay/lesbian stuff
No sex or pregnancy stuff
The sky’s the limit to how big she can get
Gaining is only eating, no magic, no hose feeding

Also try to make long chapters, at least four to five sentences

And please try to properly write the chapter and make sure the spelling is good (a few mistakes are understandable, but not when the entire chapter is filled with nearly every word spelt wrong)

So now that the rules are out of the way, let us begin
